name: Car Crash: Derby Xtreme Car
description:
Car Crash: Derby Xtreme Car is simulator game for extreme mayhem and destruction of rivals derby cars by crashing and smashing. Speed up your vintage car and monster jack to push your destruction rivals off the track with amazing crash stunts.
Features:

• Daring wrecking high speed racing adventure
• Realistic car destruction, crash and damage
• Real Car Physics and smooth driving controls
• Variety of Amazing car models and heavy trucks
• Realistic Driving Experience of cars & trucks
• Smooth Controls, Engine & hydraulic Brakes
